title: Did Trump prevent all travel from China at the beginning of the epidemic?
subtitle: Trump refers to the imposition in early 2020 of a ban on travellers from mainland China as its signature movement to respond to the epidemic.
author: Nur Ibrahim
vclaim: In February 2020, the President of the United States, Donald Trump, imposed a complete ban on travel from mainland China, a signing policy step that helped save many lives from the spread of COVID-19 in the United States.
